title: Just Faced A Scripter
body:
So i got into a soloQ ranked game and it was all normal (platinum-diamond elo).The game started all normal everyone was farming etc(i am thresh) we started getting a lead early but the catch up and the game was based on mistakes i was always going for ashe which i could seem to hit with my q so the first thing that got to my mind was that she was scripting but then a fight started and she survived without even a spelll hitting her then i realised she was scripting our jinx saw her too and enemy zyra was trying to justify her and flaming at us calling us unskilled etc so i thought we were all bad.But then again we were fighting back and fourth every sing fight she was dodging nidalee spears without vision and my qs like a god i really hope she gets banned and i am dissapointed that scripts still exist
i removed his profile in case of witch hunting as requested

replies.body:
I believe you,

Being in silver last season makes you wonder how he has a 70% win-rate and is in platinum
I was silver last season but dam, 70% winrate. You can also tell if they play mostly scripting champs like xerath etc.
Scripts cant dodge abilitys fired from fog of war btw

I know this is hard, but submit a ticket.
No shamarino is allowed which really sucks.
As much as I would fucking love too, this is to prevent (Your friends for example if you had like 100+ friends.)
to "Witch Hunt" this guy.
didn't tell my friends just so you could check actually but i removed it as requested

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=2Z2sH8Ef,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-15T00:32:38.392+0000)
>
> I know this is hard, but submit a ticket.
> No shamarino is allowed which really sucks.
> As much as I would fucking love too, this is to prevent (Your friends for example if you had like 100+ friends.)
> to "Witch Hunt" this guy.

While witch hunting would be deserved for such an offense you also left out how they don't like to give people attention for it, don't want to feed the trolls.
Your not even on the right forums.......
